title: Gida
description: zaka Iya Samun Pecky token ta hanyar ajiye Supra, riƙe ChickenWings NFTs, da amfani da Discord bot. Wanda pecky Mallakin al'umma ne 100% babu token na team Ko kadan.

intro.greeting: Brk da zuwa   ka Fara gaisawa da pecky!
intro.story: Pecky kaji ne na yau da kullum… har sai da suka ci wani Dorito mai ban mamaki a bayan rumbu. Yanzu yana ganin yana da wani abin Al,ajabi na sirri dayake Saka shi "buɗe ƙwai na gaskiya". Yana zargin zakaran gida ɗan leƙen asiri ne, yana kuma yaƙar tsuntsayen Dake bashi tsoro, Yana musu kallon kamar wasu robots ne masu halin shaidanu.
intro.tokenInfo: Babu team tokens, babu premine, Pecky mallakin al'ummar Supra ne 100%.

discord.heading: Haɗa Discord ɗinka da Pecky
discord.subtitle: Shiga leaderboard, samu Discord roles, da wayannan zaka Samu wasu fa'idodi dazasu Zo nan gaba, sannan  duka wayannan abubuwan dazaka Samu an hadasu da wallet ɗinka.
discord.pleaseConnect: Da fatan ka haɗa wallet ɗinka da farko
discord.enterDiscordId: Da fatan ka saka Discord ID
discord.invalidDiscordId: Da fatan ka saka sahihin Discord ID (lambobi guda  16 zuwa 20)
discord.unlinkSuccess: An cire haɗin Discord cikin nasara!

earn.heading: Samu Pecky Coin  Kullum kokuma Duk wata!
earn.subtitle: Kana son samun Pecky Coins kyauta?
earn.howTo: Abu ne mai sauƙi. Ka mallaki chickenwings NFT, kokuma ka ajiye SUPRA.
